EPOC-Daten

EPOC - Datensatz

#| '!! shinylive warning !!': |
#|   shinylive does not work in self-contained HTML documents.
#|   Please set `embed-resources: false` in your metadata.
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 900

library(shiny)
library(shinylive)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)

EPOC_data_df_short <- readRDS("rds/EPOC_data_df_short.rds")

# UI Definition
ui <- fluidPage(
  tags$head(
    tags$style(HTML("
      .dataTables_wrapper {
        width: 100%;
      }
      .dataTables_scrollBody {
        overflow-x: auto !important;
      }
      th, td {
        white-space: nowrap !important;
        padding: 8px !important;
      }
    "))
  ),
  titlePanel("EPOC Daten Analyse"),
  
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      width = 2,
      checkboxGroupInput("selectedBedingung", "Bedingungen:",
                         choices = unique(EPOC_data_df_short$Bedingung),
                         selected = unique(EPOC_data_df_short$Bedingung)),
      checkboxGroupInput("selectedIntensität", "Intensitäten:",
                         choices = unique(EPOC_data_df_short$Intensität),
                         selected = unique(EPOC_data_df_short$Intensität)),
      checkboxGroupInput("selectedProband", "Probanden:",
                         choices = unique(EPOC_data_df_short$Proband),
                         selected = unique(EPOC_data_df_short$Proband)),
      radioButtons("viewType", "Ansicht:",
                   choices = c("Einzelwerte" = "individual",
                               "Mittelwerte" = "means"))
    ),
    mainPanel(
      width = 10,
      DTOutput("epocTable")
    )
  )
)

# Server-Logik
server <- function(input, output, session) {
  
  # Hilfsfunktion für Nachkommastellen bleibt gleich
  get_digits_for_column <- function(col_name) {
    if(col_name %in% c("VO2_gross_SS [l·min⁻¹]", "VO2_fast [l]", "VO2_net_SS [l·min⁻¹]", 
                       "O2_Speicher [l]", "VO2_Ref [l·min⁻¹]", "VO2_Ruhe [l·min⁻¹]")) {
      return(3)
    } else if(col_name %in% c("P_Tot_kg [W·kg⁻¹]", "WPCR [kJ]", "A [l·min⁻¹]", "B [l·min⁻¹]", 
                              "C [l·min⁻¹]", "MM_akt [kg]", "R2_off", 
                              "WPCR_corrected [kJ]", "PCr_used [mmol]")) {
      return(2)
    } else if(col_name %in% c("P_Tot [W]", "TauA [s]", "TauB [s]")) {
      return(1)
    } else if(col_name %in% c("Nr", "Masse [kg]")) {
      return(0)
    }
    return(2)
  }
  
  # Reaktive gefilterte Daten
  filtered_data <- reactive({
    data <- EPOC_data_df_short
    
    # Filterung bleibt gleich
    if (length(input$selectedProband) > 0) {
      data <- data %>% filter(Proband %in% input$selectedProband)
    }
    
    if (length(input$selectedBedingung) > 0) {
      data <- data %>% filter(Bedingung %in% input$selectedBedingung)
    }
    
    if (length(input$selectedIntensität) > 0) {
      data <- data %>% filter(Intensität %in% input$selectedIntensität)
    }
    
    if (input$viewType == "means") {
      # Gruppierungsvariablen bestimmen
      group_vars <- c()
      if (length(input$selectedBedingung) > 0) {
        group_vars <- c(group_vars, "Bedingung")
      }
      if (length(input$selectedIntensität) > 0) {
        group_vars <- c(group_vars, "Intensität")
      }
      
      # Wenn keine Gruppierungsvariablen, dann Gesamtmittelwerte
      if (length(group_vars) == 0) {
        grouped_data <- data %>%
          summarise(across(where(is.numeric), 
                           list(mean = ~mean(., na.rm = TRUE),
                                sd = ~sd(., na.rm = TRUE)))) %>%
          mutate(Gruppe = "Gesamt")
        group_vars <- "Gruppe"
      } else {
        grouped_data <- data %>%
          group_by(across(all_of(group_vars))) %>%
          summarise(across(where(is.numeric), 
                           list(mean = ~mean(., na.rm = TRUE),
                                sd = ~sd(., na.rm = TRUE)))) %>%
          ungroup()
      }
      
      # Ergebnisdataframe mit Gruppierungsvariablen erstellen
      result_data <- grouped_data %>%
        select(all_of(group_vars))
      
      # Für jede numerische Spalte die Formatierung anwenden
      numeric_cols <- names(data)[sapply(data, is.numeric)]
      for(col in numeric_cols) {
        mean_col <- paste0(col, "_mean")
        sd_col <- paste0(col, "_sd")
        
        if(mean_col %in% names(grouped_data) && sd_col %in% names(grouped_data)) {
          digits <- get_digits_for_column(col)
          result_data[[col]] <- paste0(
            format(round(grouped_data[[mean_col]], digits), nsmall = digits),
            " ± ",
            format(round(grouped_data[[sd_col]], digits), nsmall = digits)
          )
        }
      }
      
      return(result_data)
    }
    
    return(data)
  })
  
  # Tabellen-Output
  output$epocTable <- renderDT({
    data <- filtered_data()
    
    if (input$viewType == "individual") {
      # Erst Spaltenbreiten berechnen
      columnDefs <- lapply(seq_len(ncol(data)), function(i) {
        list(
          targets = i-1,
          width = paste0(max(
            nchar(names(data)[i]),
            max(nchar(as.character(data[[i]])))
          ) * 10, "px"),
          className = "dt-nowrap"
        )
      })
      
      # Dann Tabelle mit allen Formatierungen erstellen
      datatable(data,
                options = list(
                  pageLength = 10,
                  scrollX = TRUE,
                  scrollCollapse = TRUE,
                  autoWidth = FALSE,
                  columnDefs = columnDefs
                )
      ) %>%
        formatRound(
          columns = c("VO2_gross_SS [l·min⁻¹]", "VO2_fast [l]", "VO2_net_SS [l·min⁻¹]", 
                      "O2_Speicher [l]", "VO2_Ref [l·min⁻¹]", "VO2_Ruhe [l·min⁻¹]"),
          digits = 3
        ) %>%
        formatRound(
          columns = c("P_Tot_kg [W·kg⁻¹]", "WPCR [kJ]", "A [l·min⁻¹]", "B [l·min⁻¹]", 
                      "C [l·min⁻¹]", "MM_akt [kg]", "R2_off", 
                      "WPCR_corrected [kJ]", "PCr_used [mmol]"),
          digits = 2
        ) %>%
        formatRound(
          columns = c("P_Tot [W]", "TauA [s]", "TauB [s]"),
          digits = 1
        ) %>%
        formatRound(
          columns = c("Nr", "Masse [kg]"),
          digits = 0
        )
    } else {
      # Mittelwerte-Ansicht
      columnDefs <- lapply(seq_len(ncol(data)), function(i) {
        list(
          targets = i-1,
          width = paste0(max(
            nchar(names(data)[i]),
            max(nchar(as.character(data[[i]])))
          ) * 10, "px"),
          className = "dt-nowrap"
        )
      })
      
      datatable(data,
                options = list(
                  pageLength = 10,
                  scrollX = TRUE,
                  scrollCollapse = TRUE,
                  autoWidth = FALSE,
                  columnDefs = columnDefs
                ),
                escape = FALSE
      )
    }
  })
}

# App starten
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)

Und weitere Werte in der Tabelle. Wie gut wurde das getroffen, hat sich das drei schrittige Modell bewährt? –> MW von tau2 beschreiben (liegt er in dieser Zeitspanne? Literatur

```{r}
# Library und dfs laden
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(shiny)
library(shinylive)
library(DT)

EPOC_data_df <- readRDS("rds/EPOC_data_df.rds")
EPOC_data_df_short <- readRDS("rds/EPOC_data_df_short.rds")
Bedingungen_data <- readRDS("rds/Bedingungen_data.rds")
```

# EPOC - Datensatz
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Spaltennamen ändern
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "R_squared_off"] <- "R2_off"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "aktive_Muskelmasse"] <- "MM_akt [kg]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "VO2_Referenz"] <- "VO2_Ref [l·min⁻¹]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "WPCR_corrected_calc"] <- "WPCR_corrected [kJ]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "P_Tot"] <- "P_Tot [W]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "P_Tot_kg"] <- "P_Tot_kg [W·kg⁻¹]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "A"] <- "A [l·min⁻¹]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "TauA"] <- "TauA [s]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "B"] <- "B [l·min⁻¹]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "TauB"] <- "TauB [s]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "C"] <- "C [l·min⁻¹]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "Masse"] <- "Masse [kg]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "VO2_Ruhe"] <- "VO2_Ruhe [l·min⁻¹]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "VO2_gross_SS"] <- "VO2_gross_SS [l·min⁻¹]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "VO2_net_SS"] <- "VO2_net_SS [l·min⁻¹]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "O2_Speicher"] <- "O2_Speicher [l]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "WPCR_corrected"] <- "WPCR_corrected [kJ]"
names(EPOC_data_df_short)[names(EPOC_data_df_short) == "PCr_used"] <- "PCr_used [mmol]"

datatable(EPOC_data_df_short,
    options = list(
        pageLength = 10,
        scrollX = TRUE,
        autoWidth = TRUE,
        columnDefs = list(
            list(
                targets = '_all',
                render = JS("function(data, type, row) {
                    if (type === 'display') {
                        return '<div style=\"white-space: nowrap\">' + data + '</div>';
                    }
                    return data;
                }")
            )
        )
    )) %>% 
    formatRound(
        columns = c("VO2_gross_SS [l·min⁻¹]", "VO2_fast [l]", "VO2_net_SS [l·min⁻¹]", 
                   "O2_Speicher [l]", "VO2_Ref [l·min⁻¹]", "VO2_Ruhe [l·min⁻¹]"),
        digits = 3
    ) %>%
    formatRound(
        columns = c("P_Tot_kg [W·kg⁻¹]", "WPCR [kJ]", "A [l·min⁻¹]", "B [l·min⁻¹]", 
                   "C [l·min⁻¹]", "MM_akt [kg]", "R2_off", 
                   "WPCR_corrected [kJ]", "PCr_used [mmol]"),
        digits = 2
    ) %>%
    formatRound(
        columns = c("P_Tot [W]", "TauA [s]", "TauB [s]"),
        digits = 1
    ) %>%
    formatRound(
        columns = c("Nr", "Masse [kg]"),
        digits = 0
    )
```

```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 900

library(shiny)
library(shinylive)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)

EPOC_data_df_short <- readRDS("rds/EPOC_data_df_short.rds")

# UI Definition
ui <- fluidPage(
  tags$head(
    tags$style(HTML("
      .dataTables_wrapper {
        width: 100%;
      }
      .dataTables_scrollBody {
        overflow-x: auto !important;
      }
      th, td {
        white-space: nowrap !important;
        padding: 8px !important;
      }
    "))
  ),
  titlePanel("EPOC Daten Analyse"),
  
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      width = 2,
      checkboxGroupInput("selectedBedingung", "Bedingungen:",
                         choices = unique(EPOC_data_df_short$Bedingung),
                         selected = unique(EPOC_data_df_short$Bedingung)),
      checkboxGroupInput("selectedIntensität", "Intensitäten:",
                         choices = unique(EPOC_data_df_short$Intensität),
                         selected = unique(EPOC_data_df_short$Intensität)),
      checkboxGroupInput("selectedProband", "Probanden:",
                         choices = unique(EPOC_data_df_short$Proband),
                         selected = unique(EPOC_data_df_short$Proband)),
      radioButtons("viewType", "Ansicht:",
                   choices = c("Einzelwerte" = "individual",
                               "Mittelwerte" = "means"))
    ),
    mainPanel(
      width = 10,
      DTOutput("epocTable")
    )
  )
)

# Server-Logik
server <- function(input, output, session) {
  
  # Hilfsfunktion für Nachkommastellen bleibt gleich
  get_digits_for_column <- function(col_name) {
    if(col_name %in% c("VO2_gross_SS [l·min⁻¹]", "VO2_fast [l]", "VO2_net_SS [l·min⁻¹]", 
                       "O2_Speicher [l]", "VO2_Ref [l·min⁻¹]", "VO2_Ruhe [l·min⁻¹]")) {
      return(3)
    } else if(col_name %in% c("P_Tot_kg [W·kg⁻¹]", "WPCR [kJ]", "A [l·min⁻¹]", "B [l·min⁻¹]", 
                              "C [l·min⁻¹]", "MM_akt [kg]", "R2_off", 
                              "WPCR_corrected [kJ]", "PCr_used [mmol]")) {
      return(2)
    } else if(col_name %in% c("P_Tot [W]", "TauA [s]", "TauB [s]")) {
      return(1)
    } else if(col_name %in% c("Nr", "Masse [kg]")) {
      return(0)
    }
    return(2)
  }
  
  # Reaktive gefilterte Daten
  filtered_data <- reactive({
    data <- EPOC_data_df_short
    
    # Filterung bleibt gleich
    if (length(input$selectedProband) > 0) {
      data <- data %>% filter(Proband %in% input$selectedProband)
    }
    
    if (length(input$selectedBedingung) > 0) {
      data <- data %>% filter(Bedingung %in% input$selectedBedingung)
    }
    
    if (length(input$selectedIntensität) > 0) {
      data <- data %>% filter(Intensität %in% input$selectedIntensität)
    }
    
    if (input$viewType == "means") {
      # Gruppierungsvariablen bestimmen
      group_vars <- c()
      if (length(input$selectedBedingung) > 0) {
        group_vars <- c(group_vars, "Bedingung")
      }
      if (length(input$selectedIntensität) > 0) {
        group_vars <- c(group_vars, "Intensität")
      }
      
      # Wenn keine Gruppierungsvariablen, dann Gesamtmittelwerte
      if (length(group_vars) == 0) {
        grouped_data <- data %>%
          summarise(across(where(is.numeric), 
                           list(mean = ~mean(., na.rm = TRUE),
                                sd = ~sd(., na.rm = TRUE)))) %>%
          mutate(Gruppe = "Gesamt")
        group_vars <- "Gruppe"
      } else {
        grouped_data <- data %>%
          group_by(across(all_of(group_vars))) %>%
          summarise(across(where(is.numeric), 
                           list(mean = ~mean(., na.rm = TRUE),
                                sd = ~sd(., na.rm = TRUE)))) %>%
          ungroup()
      }
      
      # Ergebnisdataframe mit Gruppierungsvariablen erstellen
      result_data <- grouped_data %>%
        select(all_of(group_vars))
      
      # Für jede numerische Spalte die Formatierung anwenden
      numeric_cols <- names(data)[sapply(data, is.numeric)]
      for(col in numeric_cols) {
        mean_col <- paste0(col, "_mean")
        sd_col <- paste0(col, "_sd")
        
        if(mean_col %in% names(grouped_data) && sd_col %in% names(grouped_data)) {
          digits <- get_digits_for_column(col)
          result_data[[col]] <- paste0(
            format(round(grouped_data[[mean_col]], digits), nsmall = digits),
            " ± ",
            format(round(grouped_data[[sd_col]], digits), nsmall = digits)
          )
        }
      }
      
      return(result_data)
    }
    
    return(data)
  })
  
  # Tabellen-Output
  output$epocTable <- renderDT({
    data <- filtered_data()
    
    if (input$viewType == "individual") {
      # Erst Spaltenbreiten berechnen
      columnDefs <- lapply(seq_len(ncol(data)), function(i) {
        list(
          targets = i-1,
          width = paste0(max(
            nchar(names(data)[i]),
            max(nchar(as.character(data[[i]])))
          ) * 10, "px"),
          className = "dt-nowrap"
        )
      })
      
      # Dann Tabelle mit allen Formatierungen erstellen
      datatable(data,
                options = list(
                  pageLength = 10,
                  scrollX = TRUE,
                  scrollCollapse = TRUE,
                  autoWidth = FALSE,
                  columnDefs = columnDefs
                )
      ) %>%
        formatRound(
          columns = c("VO2_gross_SS [l·min⁻¹]", "VO2_fast [l]", "VO2_net_SS [l·min⁻¹]", 
                      "O2_Speicher [l]", "VO2_Ref [l·min⁻¹]", "VO2_Ruhe [l·min⁻¹]"),
          digits = 3
        ) %>%
        formatRound(
          columns = c("P_Tot_kg [W·kg⁻¹]", "WPCR [kJ]", "A [l·min⁻¹]", "B [l·min⁻¹]", 
                      "C [l·min⁻¹]", "MM_akt [kg]", "R2_off", 
                      "WPCR_corrected [kJ]", "PCr_used [mmol]"),
          digits = 2
        ) %>%
        formatRound(
          columns = c("P_Tot [W]", "TauA [s]", "TauB [s]"),
          digits = 1
        ) %>%
        formatRound(
          columns = c("Nr", "Masse [kg]"),
          digits = 0
        )
    } else {
      # Mittelwerte-Ansicht
      columnDefs <- lapply(seq_len(ncol(data)), function(i) {
        list(
          targets = i-1,
          width = paste0(max(
            nchar(names(data)[i]),
            max(nchar(as.character(data[[i]])))
          ) * 10, "px"),
          className = "dt-nowrap"
        )
      })
      
      datatable(data,
                options = list(
                  pageLength = 10,
                  scrollX = TRUE,
                  scrollCollapse = TRUE,
                  autoWidth = FALSE,
                  columnDefs = columnDefs
                ),
                escape = FALSE
      )
    }
  })
}

# App starten
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)

```
